HOW TO ACQUIRE THE COIN OF THE GODS

PARTICIPATE IN PRESALE

  • Join our Telegram group by clicking here.
  • Go to DXSale (SHILL WITH US TO REACH 400+ MEMBERS!)
  • Wait for the timer ("Presale starts:") to be near 0 then refresh and input the amount you wish to contribute!
  • The min. and max. contribution will be available at DXsale once the listing is done by the developer.
  • For the community to grow faster, please follow the Coin of Olympus Twitter! We will post exciting updates there. Click here.
  • NOTE: Don't click any links on Telegram that are not posted by the admin to avoid scams.

PARTICIPATE AFTER PRESALE

  • Join our Telegram group by clicking here.
  • Go to Pancakeswap
  • Put any cryptocurrency you own on top (example: WBNB, ADA, BNB), then copy paste the smart contract address at the bottom.
  • The Contract Address is in the pinned post, located below the Telegram Group Name.
  • For the community to grow faster, please follow the COL Twitter! We will post exciting updates there. Click here.
  • NOTE: Don't click any links on Telegram that are not posted by the admin to avoid scams.
